dataCsv.Site_Description: The Persian sits with the hull remarkably intact even visible is the collision gash in the side. Artifacts, rigging and machinery on site include two wood stock anchors, windlass, catheads, both masts (toppled) with tops, booms and one gaff, a sheet winch on the foremast, bowsprit with a broken jib boom, centerboard and centerboard winch, capstan, bitts, deadeyes, stove, ships wheel, rudder, and traveler block. The cabin is gone but the roof of the cabin lies beside the hull along with scattered pieces of the cabin and hull or deck. The deck is intact except in the area near the collision point.
